ExternalUniqTranId.description: External Uniq Tran Id , send your uniq trnasaction id to prevent duplication of transaction. if the same ExternalUniqTranId will be send you will receive and error code 608. see 'ExternalUniqUniqTranIdResponse'

ExternalUniqUniqTranIdResponse.description: External Uniq Tran Id , send your uniq trnasaction id to prevent duplication of transaction. if the same ExternalUniqTranId will be send you will receive and error code 608. see 'ExternalUniqUniqTranIdResponse'

NumOfPayments.description: Maximum number of payment to show to card holder , default 1

IdentityNumber.description: credit card owner identity number for israel cards only

ISOCoinId.description: ISO Coin Code ,1 - ILS, 2 - USD, else ISO Coin from list : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

CustomFields.description: Fill the value of CustomFields information

IsRefund.description: Is refund transaction , 'ApiPassword' is Required to use this option

ISOCoinName.description: ISO name (alternative and override to 'IsoCoinId'). ISO Coin Name from list : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

JValidateType.description: Type of transaction for credit card in operation : CreateTokenOnly or Suspended deal, can be J2 (simple card validation) or J5 (authoriz)

CreditType.description: Type of credit for the card, for israel cards only.

AccountIdToGetCardNumber.description: Get the card number and expiretion date from account , if you need the account informatin for the invoice you need send the account Id in the document object : Document.AdvancedDefinition.AccountID and Document.AdvancedDefinition.IsLoadInfoFromAccountID=true

Document.description: Document information , will create document if transaction succeeded

DocumentTypeToCreate.description: Document type to create,  default = 0, will automatically update from admin panel configuration

TaxId.description: Business registration number or user Identity number

Email.description: Email To send the document to

Comments.description: comments to print on the document

IsVatFree.description: Is all the items in this document are VAT free?

DepartmentId.description: department ID as show at the admin panel, for reports

IsAutoCreateUpdateAccount.description:
Is to Auto update or create an Account, default = auto, will automatically update from admin panel configuration 
 במידה ולא מועבר יתבצע איתור לפי  מפתח זר ולאחר מכן לפי מזהה ייחודי אתר ואז לפי  EMAIL לקוח. (הפרמטר הראשון שנמצע בשרת מולצב ולא ממשיך לחפש עוד )

AccountForeignKey.description: The account number on a Foreign system, use for transfer to 3-party account system ( hashavshevet, SAP )

SiteUniqueId.description: Your system unique Id for this account

AccountID.description: Unique account ID in cardcom system, account must exist in CardCom system

IsLoadInfoFromAccountID.description: If AccountID is passed, CardCom system will update the document information ( To ,HP_TZ, Email ...) from existing accounts information

TotalLineCost.description: Recommended, if the Quantity contains decimal point send the total line cost to prevent round errors

IsVatFree.description: Is this product VAT Free , used for mix VAT items in one documents

ExternalId.description: External Id, custom info on document

ManualNumber.description: Manual numbering of the document. Special permission must be requested to use this parameter.

IsSendSMS.description: should the system send the document via SMS (only with the SMS module)
